name: Recycle Pick Up
description:
This game was developed during the spring quarter of 2022. During this time I was able to develop one level and a tutorial for this game. I do plan on adding more levels that take place in other setting and add other mechanics for this game. What is playable now is the core mechanics that I hope to improve for future levels.  Although I do plan to continue development for this game in the future. I will be working on other game ideas to improve my development skills. 

Notes
  • All feedback is greatly appreciated!
  • Game is best played as the downloadable version
  • WebGL and downloadable version of the games are best played in fullscreen
Credits

Assets from Unit Asset Store by Polygonal Mind

Everything else by Jonathan R
